table.name: crm_custom_group
table.comment: All extended (custom) properties are associated with a group. These are logical sets of related data.

field.name: name
field.comment: Variable name/programmatic handle for this group.

field.name: extends
field.values: Contact, Individual, Household, Organization, Location, Address
field.comment: Type of object this group extends (can add other options later e.g. contact_address, etc.).

field.name: style
field.comment: Visual relationship between this form and its parent.

field.name: help_pre
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before fields in form.

field.name: help_post
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after fields in form.

field.name: weight
field.comment: Controls display order when multiple extended property groups are setup for the same class.
